data.what_is: It is an online marketing solution that uses automation to increase the effectiveness of your performance marketing results. With Dotidot you can automate the regular stuff and instead, focus on advanced strategies automation opens for you.
data.product_description: It is an online marketing solution that uses automation to increase the effectiveness of your performance marketing results. With Dotidot you can automate the regular stuff and instead, focus on advanced strategies automation opens for you.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotidot?
This automation setup is straightforward and convenient for the digital marking of business. When someone comes to get the information published email automation setup gets active, which captures the audience for future reference. It is empowering to build better, solid and long-lasting relationships with customers. It is the ultimate solution for this modern era.

What do you dislike about Dotidot?
No dislike, but the report generation option can be more granular and specific with more options to select from drop down.

What problems is Dotidot solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping to build better relations with customers, time-saving and cost-saving for the organization.
